pastebin*: getting the same problem of dependencies
does it tell you what package is damaged or missing?
you need to remove and then reinstall libperl5.8
sudo apt-get remove --purge libperl5.8 then when it is gone sudo apt-get install libperl5.8
darolu: I have tried to install libperl5.8 but it depends on perl-baase
did you get that when you tried to install the library or when you removed it?
install perl-base then, or if you wish, install xchat directly and should install all the packages you need, do it with: sudo apt-get install xchat
darolu:But perl-base is installed in my system
try installing xchat directly, it should install the perl library you manually uninstalled
if you did remove the library, "sudo apt-get -f xchat" should work, you may need to run sudo apt-get update first
